body: Damn, Nobody134, looking at your past comments, you really are out of the real world. Now, I will reveal to you something that may change your miserable life, you are not the protagonist of Xenoblade! I know the feeling but whether the guy fucking the Xenoblade girls is the pathetic shota that serve as self insert for even more pathetic invidual such as you or someone else, in that case a muscular and more interesting character change nothing.
Ugh... haven't seen crap like this in a while... Not only is it trash NTR... But it's also extremely out of character... Pyra would never do want this.
